alert.note: Alert for Broadwater (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 03 at 8:36PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Montana, including the following counties, in southwest Montana, Broadwater and Jefferson. In west central Montana, Lewis and Clark. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 836 PM MDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. Media and public reports indicate that the flooding continues. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Black Sandy State Park, Spring Meadow Lake State Park and York. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
